posts.message: شباب، هوا ايه معني/مفهوم كلمه boilerplate في المجال بتاعنا (Software Engineering/Development)؟

Dear Geeks, I need you to help me with this dillema:

I am  officially addicted to #Crunchbang I am absolutely compelled to make it my main OS. Should I keep it as a VM? Any ideas? thoughts?

Advantages of VM:

1. Small 
2. Transferable
3. Will contain all my software and configurations
4. I have enough RAM to offer it great performance.
5. Ubuntu only takes 450 MB when it starts anyway, so starting  #! in VM is negligible in performance difference than if I started it native.
6. A 10 GB VM contains all my software  and learning needs. Easily transferable via USB and can just be ready to start again on any machine.

On the other hand:

1. It feels more organic just to boot it as main OS.
2. It consumes few resources so I can use it as my VM host. (150 MB at start)
3. It will relax my OCD tendencies to make it a full install.
4. Full install won't be transferable.
5. The lack of visual candy is relaxing to my brain, I actually feel so much better without it.

Anyway, please share your thoughts with me, this is one of the few times in my life that I can't make a clear decision an it's killing me.

posts.message:
Greetings everyone :)

I'm looking for a company, preferred in The Greek Campus, (or a freelancer or a cofounder) who can develop an iOS app that does video processing (trims, merges, and morphing transitions).

I'd like to know initial estimates of how much would it cost me in total of money and time before we meet to discuss for a more accurate estimates.

I have the UX (mockup similar to: cv.sherbeeny.com ) and can get the UI and logo done quickly, in shaa Allah.

==============================

For all iOS developers with with free time,

Away from video processing, Are you Interested in joining me as a cofounder (50/50) for another app?

I have initial UX designs for few other apps that I dream of seeing them come true.

You can know more about me at Sherbeeny.com 
If you have talent, time, and commitment... How can I know more about you?
